Title: Improved visible-light activities of nanocrystalline CdS by coupling with ultrafine NbN with lattice matching for hydrogen evolution
Abstract: © 2018 The Royal Society of Chemistry. Metallic ultrafine NbN with lattice matching to nanocrystalline CdS could replace the expensive platinum for efficiently trapping photogenerated electrons, enhancing charge separation and then activating the preferentially adsorbed H 2 O to produce H 2 , mainly confirmed by Kelvin probe experiments, Mott-Schottky plots, amount of OH produced, electrochemical experiments and density-functional-theory calculations.
SubjectAreas: Renewable Energy, Sustainability and the Environment
